sentences.en: And that was how I won the 2004 Australian Grand Prix.
sentences.cn: 这便是我如何赢得2004澳大利亚大奖赛.

sentences.en: As a Grand Prix driver, you have the Sword of Damocles hanging over your head at every moment.
sentences.cn: 作为国际汽车大奖赛的车手，随时都有可能发生事故。

sentences.en: Britain came second in the Prix St Georges Derby.
sentences.cn: 英国在圣乔治赛马大奖赛中荣获亚军。

sentences.en: Cracow Film Festival – Grand Prix – The Golden Hobby Horse.
sentences.cn: 比佛利山国际电影节官方正式观摩影片.

sentences.en: He never won the British Grand Prix.
sentences.cn: 他从未赢过英国国际汽车大奖赛。

sentences.en: I reckon it is the greatest race among all the grands prix.
sentences.cn: 我认为这里是全年最棒的大奖赛.

sentences.en: Instead, the San Marino Grand Prix is held 100 km north in Italy.
sentences.cn: 相反的, 圣马利诺一级方程式赛车赛实际上是在一百公里外的义大利北部举行的.

sentences.en: Luxury yachts line up to watch the Monaco Grand Prix.
sentences.cn: 成排的豪华游艇观看摩纳哥大奖赛.

sentences.en: Nakajima insists he is fully fit to tackle the Malaysian grand prix.
sentences.cn: 中岛一贵坚持说,他是完全适合解决马来西亚大奖赛.

sentences.en: Q: Giancarlo, keeping the momentum going after a great Malaysian Grand Prix.
sentences.cn: 问: 吉安卡洛,在精彩的马来西亚大奖赛结束之后你还继续保持着速度.

sentences.en: The grand prix is controlled by well-trained marshals.
sentences.cn: 大奖赛由训练有素的典礼官协调指挥。

sentences.en: The three-race series will be a curtain-raiser to the Monaco Grand Prix in May.
sentences.cn: 这3场系列赛将为5月份的摩纳哥大奖赛拉开序幕。

sentences.en: This year marks the 26 th running of the San Marino Grand Prix.
sentences.cn: 今年是第26届圣马力诺大奖赛.

sentences.en: We are looking forward to next week � � s Malaysian Grand Prix.
sentences.cn: 现在车队上下正在盼望下周马来西亚大奖赛的来临.

sentences.en: What does your home Grand Prix mean to you?
sentences.cn: 家乡赛对你而言意味着 什么 ?

phrases.tran_cn: n. 国际汽车大奖赛；头等奖，最高奖
